```{r}

myCol <- brewer.pal(4, "Set1")

futile.logger::flog.threshold(futile.logger::ERROR, name = "VennDiagramLogger")

plt <- venn.diagram(
  x = list(crb, dlpfc, erc, hippo),
  category.names = c("CRB","DLPFC","ERC","HIPPO"),
  filename = NULL,
  #output=TRUE
  #imagetype="png" ,
  height = 480 , 
  width = 480 , 
  resolution = 300,
  compression = "lzw",
  
  # Circles
  lwd = 4,
  lty = 'blank',
  col= myCol,
  fill = myCol,
  
  # Numbers
  cex = 1,
  fontface = "bold",
  fontfamily = "sans",
  cat.col = myCol,
  
)

```

```{r}
grid.newpage()
grid.draw(plt)
```
